booking_cancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
booking_cancelled.approvalMessage: Your cancellation request for the booking on {{bookingDate}} has been approved
booking_cancelled.teacherDeactivatedMessage: Your session with {{teacherName}} on {{bookingDate}} has been cancelled. The teacher is no longer available. Please contact the studio to reschedule.

cancellation_requested.title: Cancellation Request
cancellation_requested.messageWithReason: {{customerName}} requested to cancel booking on {{bookingDate}}. Reason: {{reason}}
cancellation_requested.rejectionMessage: Your cancellation request for the booking on {{bookingDate}} was rejected. Please contact the teacher for more details.
cancellation_requested.rejectionMessageWithReason: Your cancellation request for the booking on {{bookingDate}} was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}

package_approved.title: Package Request Approved
package_approved.message: Your {{packageType}} package with {{sessions}} sessions has been approved and activated!

package_rejected.title: Package Request Rejected
package_rejected.message: Your package request was rejected. Please contact admin for more details.
package_rejected.messageWithReason: Your package request was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}

booking_approved.title: Booking Request Approved
booking_approved.message: Your booking request for {{bookingDate}} has been approved by {{teacherName}}

booking_rejected.title: Booking Request Rejected
booking_rejected.message: Your booking request for {{bookingDate}} was rejected. Please contact the teacher for more details.
booking_rejected.messageWithReason: Your booking request for {{bookingDate}} was rejected. Reason: {{reason}}

registration_approved.title: Registration Approved - Welcome!
registration_approved.message: Welcome! Your registration has been approved and you've been assigned a {{packageName}} package with {{totalSessions}} sessions. Start booking your classes now!

inactive_reminder.title: We Miss You!
inactive_reminder.message: It's been a while since your last session. Ready to get back on track? Book a session today and continue your Pilates journey!
